_sText:
>>> Surf_greatriver_Xtreme_v3 <<<

This is a another surf_greatriver version.
The map has been online for quite a while now, this upload is on request.
This clanmap has a lot of boost and is easy to surf. Many tricks and secruits make the map for the best.

[GER] >X< Xtreme Gam!ng |Only Surf|Xtreme.cs-clan.org Clan-Server|Tick 100|by gs4you.de

The server ip: 79.133.39.205:27050

Our X-Treme Website : www.Xtreme.cs-clan.org

Changes made from -> xtreme ->> xtreme_v2 ->>> xtreme_v3

- A lot of optimization, bugfixes
- Reduced filesize
- Texture change
- The teleporter on pool
- Anti-camp on super-sky
- Added a Adminroom
- Added 1 bigger secret -> Blue lasers in jail
- Added 2 floors on Jail
- Added a "Knife room"
- Another Bridge
- More surfs
- Replaced lettering with new
- Added water on super-top
- Added surfs on top
- Added surf on supersky
- Direct access to boost beneath pool
- Added a few secret teleports
- Removed secret room beneath ct spawn
- Edit the Weapon platform
- A small house and electro shock on the pool
- On/off Lights in the adminroom
- Healpoint in the adminroom
- Monitors in the adminroom
- Many logos have been added to the information

->>> And more on the Xtreme-Map , have fun
